If anifstatement is the only statement in theelseblock, it is often clearer to use anelse ifform.
if(foo){// ...}else{if(bar){// ...}}1234567Copy code to clipboard
should be rewritten as
if(foo){// ...}elseif(bar){// ...}12345Copy code to clipboard
